includedAssets.title: X-Men
includedAssets.synopsis: Hugh Jackman and Patrick Stewart are the heroic mutants out to save the world from Ian McKellen's vengeful villain in this superhero spectacular.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Hugh Jackman and Patrick Stewart are the heroic mutants out to save the world from Ian McKellen's vengeful villain in this superhero spectacular.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Hugh Jackman and Patrick Stewart are the heroic mutants out to save the world from Ian McKellen's vengeful villain in this superhero spectacular.

includedAssets.title: X-Men 2
includedAssets.synopsis: From the opening scene where Alan Cumming's gymnastic mutant Nightcrawler scurries along the corridors of The White House, you know director Bryan Singer's sequel is going to deliver the Marvel Comics goods. Despite their ongoing differences of opinion, old rivals Professor X (Patrick Stewart) and Magneto (Ian McKellen) have to forget their differences to face up to Brian Cox's fascist military leader who wants the mutants wiped from the face of the Earth. Superior superhero stuff.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Telepathic professor Patrick Stewart and his superhero team return to stop war between mutants and humans.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: From the opening scene where Alan Cumming's gymnastic mutant Nightcrawler scurries along the corridors of The White House, you know director Bryan Singer's sequel is going to deliver the Marvel Comics goods. Despite their ongoing differences of opinion, old rivals Professor X (Patrick Stewart) and Magneto (Ian McKellen) have to forget their differences to face up to Brian Cox's fascist military leader who wants the mutants wiped from the face of the Earth. Superior superhero stuff.

includedAssets.title: X-Men: The Last Stand
includedAssets.synopsis: The Marvel-lous mutants unleash their unique talents for a third X-capade in which a 'cure' is discovered for the mutant condition. Once again, malevolent Magneto (Ian McKellen) wages war on the human oppressors, while Wolverine (Hugh Jackman), Professor X (Patrick Stewart) and the X-folk strive to keep the peace. But that's not easy with resurrected telepath Jean Grey (Famke Janssen) wreaking havoc in her uncontrollable new persona. As chaotic and characterful as you'd expect (hello Vinnie Jones! ), there's plenty for action freaks plenty to chew on.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The X-Men go claw to claw with Magneto's army in a battle that will decide the mutants' fates.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The Marvel-lous mutants unleash their unique talents for a third X-capade in which a 'cure' is discovered for the mutant condition. Once again, malevolent Magneto (Ian McKellen) wages war on the human oppressors, while Wolverine (Hugh Jackman), Professor X (Patrick Stewart) and the X-folk strive to keep the peace. But that's not easy with resurrected telepath Jean Grey (Famke Janssen) wreaking havoc in her uncontrollable new persona. As chaotic and characterful as you'd expect (hello Vinnie Jones! ), there's plenty for action freaks plenty to chew on.

includedAssets.title: X-Men Origins: Wolverine
includedAssets.synopsis: From Canadian kid to metal-boned mutant, the history of Hugh Jackman's clawed crusader is revealed. Action with Ryan Reynolds.

includedAssets.title: The Wolverine
includedAssets.synopsis: Hugh Jackman reprises his role as the clawed mutant in this action-packed X-Men spin-off.

includedAssets.title: X-Men: Days Of Future Past
includedAssets.synopsis: With mutants and their human allies under threat, the X-Men send Wolverine back to the 70s to change their fate. Starring Hugh Jackman.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: With mutants and their human allies under threat, the X-Men send Wolverine back to the 70s to change their fate. Starring Hugh Jackman.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: With mutants and their human allies under threat, the X-Men send Wolverine back to the 70s to change their fate. Starring Hugh Jackman.

includedAssets.title: X-Men
includedAssets.synopsis: When a mutated section of mankind are treated with prejudice after evolving super-powers, two factions of these mutants wage an ideological war over whether to embrace or exterminate humans. Comic book action with Hugh Jackman, Halle Berry, Patrick Stewart, Ian McKellen, Jennifer Lawrence, James McAvoy and Michael Fassbender.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: When a mutated section of mankind are rejected after evolving super-powers, two factions battle over the future of humanity. Hugh Jackman stars.

Comic book action with Hugh Jackman, Halle Berry, Patrick Stewart, Ian McKellen, Jennifer Lawrence, James McAvoy and Michael Fassbender.
